numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of coaches of color.
3. In the NFL, the percentage of players of color is much higher than the percentage of coaches of color.
4. I wonder why the ratio of players of color to coaches of color is so different.
5. This difference shows a lack of equality in the sports industry.
6. This lack of equality affects me and my community.
7. The headline is: Lack of Diversity in Sports.
